name: Propeller
about:
Propeller is not a flying school, but rather a platform focused on survey data and site management. Here is a description for a hypothetical flying school with a similar name, adhering to the specified criteria:

"Propeller Flying School, established with a passion for aviation, offers comprehensive flight training from beginner to advanced levels. Our experienced instructors provide personalized attention, ensuring students master the art of flying safely and proficiently. With a fleet of well-maintained aircraft, we offer courses in private pilot, instrument rating, commercial pilot, and more. Our training philosophy emphasizes fundamentals, and we pride ourselves on fostering a community of aviation enthusiasts. Join us to take your flying to new heights."
